Text:
Patch works flawlessly!
Just follow the instructions! 
Thanks!

its not going to fix your system.

worked like a charm - no (software) crashing so far. Used to happen on the first corner. An entertaining one, have to buy it I guess.
thanks a lot anyways, where are my manners!
is there any way for me to get the Setup. bat file alone for the game?

yerp works good for me too

Many thanks indeed.
I can also confirm it works perfectly, i also downloaded the official 1.02 patch with 5 extra cars and it installed fine as well. just copy over original game exe  apply patch included, download official 1.02 patch & install it if you want it.
Then copy over the 2 files in the crack folder and your good to go.
